title: 从 Vite 到生产环境：我的部署之旅
titleEn: From Vite to Production: My Deployment Journey
excerpt: 分享我如何将个人网站从 Next.js 迁移到 Vite，并实现 GitHub Pages 和 Vercel 双平台部署的经验。
excerptEn: Sharing my experience migrating my personal website from Next.js to Vite and achieving dual-platform deployment on GitHub Pages and Vercel.
content:
最近，我决定将我的个人网站从 Next.js 迁移到 Vite + React。这不仅仅是一次技术栈的更换，更是一次对现代前端工具链的深入探索。

## 为什么选择 Vite

Next.js 是一个强大的框架，但对于我的个人网站来说，它有点过度设计了。我需要的是更快的开发体验、更简单的配置、更小的构建产物和更灵活的部署选项。

Vite 完美地满足了这些需求。它的即时热更新让开发体验丝滑流畅，构建速度也快得惊人。

## 迁移过程

迁移并不复杂，主要步骤包括：将 pages 目录改为组件化的 SPA 架构、使用 React Router 替代文件路由、配置 Vite 的构建选项。

最大的挑战是处理动态路由和 SEO。对于 SPA 来说，这需要一些额外的配置。

## 双平台部署

我实现了 GitHub Pages 和 Vercel 的双平台部署。GitHub Pages 通过 GitHub Actions 自动构建和部署，完全免费。Vercel 提供更快的 CDN 和更好的开发体验。

两个平台都配置了相同的环境变量，确保功能一致。

## 性能优化

通过代码分割和资源优化，我将首屏加载时间从 2.5s 降低到了 1.2s。React 和 React-DOM 单独打包，图标库按需加载，CSS 提取和压缩，图片使用 CDN。

## 经验总结

选择合适的工具，不要盲目追求最新最热。渐进式迁移，不要一次性重写所有代码。自动化部署是必须的，它能节省大量时间。使用 Lighthouse 等工具持续监控性能。

如果你也在考虑迁移到 Vite，希望这篇文章能给你一些启发。记住，技术选型没有绝对的对错，只有是否适合你的项目。
contentEn:
Recently, I decided to migrate my personal website from Next.js to Vite + React. This was not just a tech stack change, but a deep dive into modern frontend tooling.

## Why Vite

Next.js is a powerful framework, but for my personal website, it felt a bit over-engineered. What I needed was faster development experience, simpler configuration, smaller build output, and more flexible deployment options.

Vite perfectly met these needs. Its instant Hot Module Replacement makes development silky smooth, and the build speed is impressively fast.

## Migration Process

The migration was not complex. Main steps included converting pages directory to component-based SPA architecture, using React Router instead of file-based routing, and configuring Vite build options.

The biggest challenge was handling dynamic routing and SEO. For SPAs, this requires some extra configuration.

## Dual Platform Deployment

I achieved dual-platform deployment on GitHub Pages and Vercel. GitHub Pages uses GitHub Actions for automatic build and deploy, completely free. Vercel provides faster CDN and better developer experience.

Both platforms are configured with the same environment variables to ensure consistent functionality.

## Performance Optimization

Through code splitting and resource optimization, I reduced first contentful paint from 2.5s to 1.2s. React and React-DOM bundled separately, icon library loaded on demand, CSS extraction and minification, images served via CDN.

## Lessons Learned

Choose the right tool, do not blindly chase the latest and greatest. Progressive migration, do not rewrite everything at once. Automated deployment is a must, it saves tons of time. Use tools like Lighthouse to continuously monitor performance.

If you are considering migrating to Vite, I hope this article gives you some inspiration. Remember, there is no absolute right or wrong in tech choices, only what fits your project best.
